attributes.action: Remove 100 year old, yet riddled with errors math equations from schooltextbooks
attributes.additional_details:
Incorrect by scientific empirical evidence not by typos 
and replace them with entirely new formulas that already available based on the theory of congruence.

For example, replace the electron configuration formula 2×n^2 with 3×2^n and so on.

Parliament must intervene the curriculum so that the younger generation becomes the pioneers of the CORRECT and ACCURATE also SOPHISTICATED fundamental science.
attributes.background: Our youth entitled to be educated with accurate math equations  because by Compared to entirely new mathematical formulas based on the theory of congruence, these old formulas simply cannot solve any empirical scientific problems.

rejection.details: Decisions about the textbooks used in schools are a matter for the school in question.
